QuestData.Title: When All Is Aligned
QuestData.Description: The ravenspeaker acolytes have been equipped with Apexis interfaces, they just need to get close enough.$B$BCome, let us take to the skies and secure the Terrace of Dawn.$B$BWhen all is aligned, we shall turn the false suns against one another and the spires shall burn like torches!$B$BI look forward to penning your actions into history.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly upon Ka'alu and kill $1oa Adherents.
QuestData.RewardText: Percy and I want to give you something as a token of our thanks. It's not much but please, take your reward.
